statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ 16 \\ 22 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -6 \\ 8 \\ 14 \\ 20 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
